name: Active Worlds
description: An online virtual world, developed by ActiveWorlds Inc., a company based in Newburyport, Massachusetts.

name: Decentraland
description: A 3D virtual world browser-based platform. Users may buy virtual plots of land in the platform as NFTs via the MANA cryptocurrency, which uses the Ethereum blockchain.

name: Roblox
description: An online game platform and game creation system developed by Roblox Corporation that allows users to program games and play games created by other users.

name: Voxels (Cryptovoxels)
description: A is a virtual world and metaverse, powered by the Ethereum blockchain

name: Somnium Space
description: A VR is an open, social & persistent VR platform built on blockchain. Buy land, build or import NFTs and instantly explore. Universe shaped entirely by players!

name: Horizon Worlds
description: A free virtual reality, online video game with an integrated game creation system developed and published by Meta Platforms.

name: Second Life
description: An online multimedia platform that allows people to create an avatar for themselves and then interact with other users and user-created content within a multi-user online virtual world.

name: Sinespace
description: A free-to-play massively multiplayer online Unity 3D-based platform created and published by Sine Wave Entertainment. It enables users to create and sell 3D content and interact with others as 3D avatars.

name: VRChat
description: An online virtual world platform created by Graham Gaylor and Jesse Joudrey and operated by VRChat, Inc. The platform allows users to interact with others with user-created 3D avatars and worlds.
